TextView.android:text: This App helps in mapping Trees to their Latitude and Longitude. Once an image is taken and sent to the database server,GIS mapping of that image takes place on Google Maps. This helps in creating a central server database of trees in a campus,locality or city. User can share images clicked by him/her on facebook also and get details of activities of such post in the app itself. To use this app user must Log in via his/her Facebook Account. The App has been created under a research done at IIMM-B Bangalore
